# spotted Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "spotted" {
  client_id = "My Client ID"
  client_secret = "My Client Secret"
  access_token = "My Access Token"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `access_token` (String)
- `base_url` (String) Set the base url that the provider connects to.
- `client_id` (String)
- `client_secret` (String)
